name: IzySmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Izy line allows you to activate or program lighting, appliances, curtains and gates, and to control accesses with locks and video intercoms intelligently. Just a tap on the app, or a request to Alexa. To connect your devices to Alexa, just follow these steps:
(1) Download the “Izy Smart” application, present in both application stores.
(2) Create your in-app account.
(3) Have your Smart product installed or on hand.
(4) Configure the product in the Izy Smart app and choose an appropriate name, as the app will be used by Skill Izy Smart and will be mentioned in voice commands.
(5) Download the Alexa app from your app store.
(6) Configure your voice / speaker in the app.
(7) Look for Izy Smart in the list of skills on the Alexa app.
(8) Enable the Izy Smart skill. You will be directed to a Login page.
(9) Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
(10) Ready! Your application is linked to Alexa.
Take the opportunity to control your Smart devices by voice commands, such as:
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn on the air conditioner”
“Alexa, close the curtains”
“Alexa, what is the status of the lock? "
